articles.title: Trump says US strike on vessel in Caribbean targeted Venezuela's Tren de Aragua gang, killed 11
articles.description: Donald Trump announced that a U.S. strike on a vessel in the Caribbean targeted the Venezuelan gang Tren de Aragua, resulting in 11 deaths [1].

articles.title: Mass evacuations in Pakistan's flooded Punjab hit 300,000 in 48 hours
articles.description: Mass evacuations in Pakistan's flooded Punjab hit 300,000 in 48 hours after India released water from overflowing dams into low-lying border regions. These are the worst floods since 2022, when climate-induced flooding killed nearly 1,700 people [2].

articles.title: China displays its military strength in a parade on the 80th anniversary of the end of WWII
articles.description: China displayed its military strength in a parade on the 80th anniversary of the end of WWII. The parade revealed new hypersonic missiles, drone submarines, and ICBMs and united Xi, Kim, and Putin in a symbolic walk of solidarity [1].
